net.openhft.chronicle.bytes.ref

Class BinaryIntReference

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.openhft.chronicle.core.io.AbstractCloseable
      • net.openhft.chronicle.bytes.ref.AbstractReference
        • net.openhft.chronicle.bytes.ref.BinaryIntReference
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Byteable, net.openhft.chronicle.core.io.CloseableTracer, net.openhft.chronicle.core.io.ManagedCloseable, net.openhft.chronicle.core.io.QueryCloseable, net.openhft.chronicle.core.io.ReferenceOwner, net.openhft.chronicle.core.values.IntValue

    public class BinaryIntReference
extends AbstractReference
implements net.openhft.chronicle.core.values.IntValue
    This class acts as a Binary 32-bit in values. c.f. TextIntReference
